      • loadAntiquary

        public static Antiquary loadAntiquary()
                               throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                      java.io.IOException,
                                      NotFoundException
        Loads the antiquary
        Returns:
        The antiquary
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - when a file where the information was saved is not found
        java.io.IOException - when a problem with the loading occurs
        NotFoundException - when there is information missing

      • closeAntiquary

        public void closeAntiquary()
                    throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                           java.io.IOException
        Closes the antiquary and saves all the information
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - when a file where the information is stored is not found
        java.io.IOException - when a problem with the saving occurs
